title: My phone wont turn on after getting slightly wet in rain.
content:
i got wet in rain and pixel showed a warning that the USB devices are disabled to protect against any liquid. After 15 mins, the device got switched off. Later, i left it to dry (it was just wet in a drizzle of rain). This morning onwards, it wont turn on. Not even the battery symbol was shown. 

I tried keeping different chargers, but unable to get anything sorted.

I have tried doing the troubleshooting as well, but no luck.

Any support please?
